fields.author: By John Troan
fields.content: Most stories about the President's Conference on Cancer and Heart Disease mentioned tobacco smoke as a hazard. The report 'research has almost wiped caused by viruses just as infection does, but also due to exposure to high-energy radiation from X-rays or other sources.' Many lives can be saved if people apply this knowledge.
